replies.body:
That keyboard isn't torn in pieces 0/10 inaccurate example.



Upvoted doe.

That's what seperates the good katarinas from the great ones. A good katarina will tear down their keyboard. A great one knows the precise raw force needed to get penta without wrecking the board. That way, he can get another penta when the enemies respawn.
Jeez just get another keyboard lol
Having a stack of keyboards under your desk is also an option. Some consider that pay to win, though.
http://tse1.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.M4c5ff45401aee308e8677ec991e31fefo0&w=270&h=188&c=7&rs=1&qlt=90&o=4&pid=1.1
I got Yorick in aram today. I can confirm.
This genuinely made me happy. Mostly because the head just kinda face planted on the keyboard and was just sitting there for a second before it moved.
http://stream1.gifsoup.com/view/257866/keyboard-smash-o.gif

> [{quoted}](name=hoes and bows,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=dVLaA4FR,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-14T21:24:29.307+0000)

> http://stream1.gifsoup.com/view/257866/keyboard-smash-o.gif

That's the {{champion:67}} player going insane after they died in a 1v5.

Ofcourse, that was all the support's fault.

_Almighty._
Why do you "sign" your comments?
That escalated quickly
Reported for botting.
This triggers me as a Kat main
Whenever I get a penta people always say "It was on Kata so it doesn't count"
But it doesn't.
T_T
it counts if you have tank items bro
Not even AD?

hextech gunblade was a thing for kata, it let her sustain with garens tankiness ;3

{{item:3068}} {{item:3001}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3111}} kappa
'Twas a joke
getting a pentakill is so easy that you dont even have to have league client open
Yeah, he just alt tabbed. He knows what he's doing. Already preparing to make a pentakill compilation video.

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Poro,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=dVLaA4FR,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-08-15T00:05:28.942+0000)
>
> Yeah, he just alt tabbed. He knows what he's doing. Already preparing to make a pentakill compilation video.

yeah man he was already uploading it to youtube before it even happened
:( even when i don't get a penta someone  says in after game chat "Katarina no skill champ" and I just sit there with my bruised face FeelsBadMan

Katarina is a very weak champion.  Easily countered in lane, and tremendously loses to tanks. Cc absolutely destroys her. 

If katarina gets fed, its someone on your team's fault.

> [{quoted}](name=Trump2016MAGA12,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=dVLaA4FR,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-08-15T06:27:41.064+0000)
>
> Katarina is a very weak champion. 

It was not always this way. In S4, everything was scared of the mighty Katarina. But then Riot nation attacked with their hammer of nerfing injustice. It was a bloody battle, but Katarina survived. Legends are told, She's waiting for her opportunity to strike back and usurp the throne once more!
Not enough broken keys. :^)
logged in just to upvote {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
